queries.title: Filter Sales with Quantity > 100
queries.pandas:
import pandas as pd
sales = pd.read_csv('sales.csv')
filtered_sales = sales[sales['Quantity'] > 100]

queries.title: Calculate Total Sales
queries.dax:
EVALUATE
SUMMARIZE (
    Sales,
    ADDCOLUMNS (
        SUM ( Sales[Amount] )
    )
)
queries.pandas:
import pandas as pd
sales = pd.read_csv('sales.csv')
total_sales = sales['Amount'].sum()
